title: Orc Warrior (3C101)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow

Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Minion • Orc
Strength:	9

Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert this minion and discard your [Sauron] condition to make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards from his or her draw deck.
Lore:	“Orcs were multiplying again in the mountains.”
Rarity:	C
